extendedProjectWizard_notAuthorized_titl: You must be logged in to use the extended project configurator
extendedProjectWizard_notAuthorized_teas: Don't have an account yet? You can register here...
extendedProjectWizard_wizard_teaser: You get the full project configurator experience here in the extended wizard. If you wish, you can enter all details of the upcoming project here. Define features, structure and design, as well as content for each page or special requests. Projects captured here can be commissioned directly, and results are available in record time.
getStarted_meta_description: Start your project with our configurator.
getStarted_teaser_description: Choose the right configurator to start your project and get a first estimate.
getStarted_benefits_fast_description: Get a first estimate in just a few minutes.
getStarted_benefits_transparent_descript: Full cost control and clear overview of services.
getStarted_benefits_documentation_descri: All steps and decisions are recorded.
getStarted_cta_description: Choose your configurator now and get started!
getStarted_wizardSelection_basicConfigur: Quickly get an approximate price estimate. The Basic Configurator can serve as a first indicator and is done in 1 minute.
getStarted_wizardSelection_advancedConfi: Capture your entire project in detail. Manage the result in your personal dashboard.
getStarted_registrationPrompt_descriptio: Would you like to configure your project in detail and make it more concrete? To use the advanced wizard and save your project, please create an account.
This will give you access to your personal dashboard, where you can manage multiple projects. Your email address is sufficient for registration.
wizard_stepCategory_titleSecond: ? Which direction are we going to take?
wizard_stepCategory_teaser: Is your idea a typical website or web application project? Or are you looking into a more individual / specialized approach? Please chose the category first.
wizard_stepType_teaser: Let us refine your vidion a bit. Choose the approperiate option.
wizard_stepSubType_teaser: Lass uns deine Vision etwas verfeinern. Wähle die passende Option!
wizard_stepFeatures_titleSecond: wünschst du dir für dein Projekt?
wizard_stepFeatures_teaser: Je detaillierter wird den Umfang hier ausprägen, je gernauer und verlässlicher kann die Preiseinschätzug vorgenommen werden!
wizard_stepBasicDetails_teaser: Es hilft uns sehr, deine Erwartungshaltung besser zu verstehen und einen geeigneten Preis zu schätzen, wenn du hier noch ein paar Angaben machst.
wizard_stepSummary_teaser: Hier erhältst du eine erste Einschätzung zu deinem Vorhaben. So haben wir es verstanden, diese Kosten sind für eine professionelle Umsetzung zu erwarten.
wizard_categories_websitesAndApps_descri: Need a One-Pager, Corporate Website, or complex Web Application? Chose this.
wizard_categories_kiAndFreestyle_descrip: Do you have a more specialized intent? You can inquery your individual project here.
wizard_type_websites_description: Any format, any scope. You need a website with or without content management.
wizard_type_app_description: You need a web app or PWA with clear features and interactions.
wizard_type_ai: It should be an AI solution
wizard_type_ai_description: You want AI-powered functions, workflows, or automation.
wizard_type_freestyle_description: You have a special project that does not fit standard categories.
wizard_subTypes_onepager_description: Reicht dir eine einzelne Seite ohne Schnickschnack? Möchtest du einfach nur unter eigener Domain erreichbar sein? Oder brauchst eine  Vorschaltseite (Maintenance-Page)? Bringe Basis-Infos (Öffnungszeiten, Kontaktdaten) schnell und günstig online.
wizard_subTypes_onepagerPlus_description: Klassischer One-Pager. Auf einer Seite (mit Sprungmarken-Navigation) alle Infos zu einem Thema, Produkt, Veranstaltung... Nutze diese Option für eine günstige und unkomplizierte Kampagnenseiten (Landingpage).
wizard_subTypes_corporateWebsite_descrip: Der absolute Standard. Ein professioneller und sicherer Unternehmensauftritt im Internet. Bis zu 5 individuelle Inhaltsseiten, Impressum, Datenschutzhinweis, Kontaktformular, DSGVO, ... Hosting und Wartung für ein Jahr sind bereits inbegriffen.
wizard_subTypes_corporateWebsitePlus_des: Jedes Website-Projekt ist - angereichert mit Features - stets individuell. Wenn vorab klar ist, dass es größer werden soll (+30 Inhaltsseiten, vielfältige Funktionalität, Integration), dann lohnt das Corporate Website Plus Paket.
wizard_subTypes_cms_description: Eine Inhaltsverwaltung ist nicht immer nötig, aber meist sinnvoll. Das kann die einfache Pflege einzelener Bereiche oder Objekte einer bestehenenden Webseite sein oder sehr komplex und umfangreich werden. Hier findest du deinen CMS-Start.
wizard_subTypes_cmsPlus_description: Redaktionelle Systeme mit vielen individuellen Informationsobjekten oder die 'headless' Nutzung von Inhaltsbausteinen. Die Umsetzung individueller und komplexer CMS-Lösungen, bieten wir ebenfalls an. Wähle diese Option, wenn dein CMS-Vorhaben größer wird.
wizard_features_kontaktformular_descript: Ein individuelles Kontaktformular, welches alle Anfragen erfasst.
wizard_features_chatbot_description: KI-gestützter Chatbot für Kundenservice und Beratung
wizard_features_bildergalerie_descriptio: Responsive Bildergalerie mit Lightbox-Funktionalität und Kategorisierung
wizard_features_portfolioGrid_descriptio: Responsive Portfolio-Raster zur Präsentation von Arbeiten
wizard_features_kalender_description: Interaktiver Kalender mit Event-Management und Terminanzeige
wizard_features_dateiupload_description: Sichere Datei-Upload-Funktionalität mit Validierung und Vorschau
wizard_features_customTeaser_description: Individuelle Teaser-Komponenten für Inhalte und Produkte
wizard_features_customCarousel_descripti: Maßgeschneiderte Karussell-Komponente für Bilder und Inhalte
wizard_features_akkordeon_description: Zusammenklappbare Inhaltsabschnitte für FAQ und strukturierte Inhalte
wizard_features_tabs_description: Tab-Navigation zur übersichtlichen Darstellung von Inhalten
wizard_features_themeSwitcher_descriptio: Dark/Light Mode Toggle und individuelle Theme-Auswahl
wizard_features_suchfunktion_description: Intelligente Suchfunktion für Website-Inhalte mit Filteroptionen
wizard_features_customFilter_description: Erweiterte Filterfunktionen für Produktkataloge und Inhalte
wizard_features_multiStepDialog_descript: Mehrstufige Formulare und Dialoge für komplexe Eingaben
wizard_features_assistent_description: Digitaler Assistent zur Benutzerführung und Hilfestellung
wizard_features_bewertungsmechanismus_de: Bewertungs- und Review-System für Produkte oder Services
wizard_features_benutzerkonten_descripti: User-Management mit Registrierung, Login und Profilverwaltung
wizard_features_barrierefreiheitTools_de: Accessibility-Features für bessere Nutzbarkeit und WCAG-Konformität
wizard_features_mapsIntegration_descript: Google Maps, Mapbox oder OpenStreetMap Integration mit Standortmarkierungen
wizard_features_socialMediaIntegration_d: Einbindung von Social Media Feeds und Sharing-Buttons
wizard_features_analyticsIntegration_des: Integration von Google Analytics, Matomo oder anderen Tracking-Tools
wizard_features_seo_description: Suchmaschinenoptimierung mit Meta-Tags, Schema-Markup und Performance
wizard_steps_step1_teaser: Choose the type of your project. This selection determines the available options in the following steps.
wizard_steps_step2_teaser: Choose the appropriate variant for your project. Each option has different features and prices.
wizard_steps_step3_teaser: The more detailed you describe your project, the more accurately we can calculate a price for you.
wizard_steps_step4_teaser: Select all the features you want. Each feature expands the possibilities of your project and affects the price.
wizard_steps_step5_teaser: Define the structure and content of your project. This information helps us with planning and implementation.
wizard_steps_step5_content_pages_descrip: What pages or sections should your website have? Also describe the desired content for each page.
wizard_steps_step6_teaser: Define the visual appearance of your project. These settings determine the look and feel.
wizard_steps_stepMaterials_teaser: Upload relevant documents, specifications or other materials that help us with implementation.
wizard_steps_stepMaterials_files_descrip: Upload specifications, wireframes, existing documentation or other relevant files.
wizard_steps_stepMaterials_files_formats: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, AI, PSD, TXT, XLSX, PPTX
wizard_steps_stepSummary_teaser: Review your configuration. You can return to previous steps at any time to make changes.
wizard_steps_stepSummary_pdfGeneration_e: Error creating PDF. Please try again.
wizard_steps_stepSummary_disclaimer: Nonbinding estimate. The final price will be determined after a personal conversation.
wizard_steps_stepSummary_fontPreview: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis minima officia eveniet fugiat ad dicta quia optio quod possimus sint enim doloremque, consectetur ut est quibusdam corporis obcaecati dolore dolores!
wizard_steps_stepSummary_priceTiers_tier: This is manageable. We can almost certainly offer the lowest price.
A few features have been selected, but the complexity is still moderate: mid-range price.
The project is not trivial. There are several requested features. We are at the upper end.
What you have in mind is quite demanding. Many or very complex features are included. We will likely need the full range and may even be slightly above it.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier1_message: Your project is manageable, we are certainly at the lower end of the price range.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier2_message: Your project is well feasible, the price is in the middle range.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier3_message: Your project is demanding, the price is in the upper range.
wizard_steps_priceTiers_tier4_message: Oh, that's a lot you're asking for. We're certainly above XXX€.
wizard_design_colorSchemeDescription: Select the main colors for your project. If you already have corporate colors, enter them here.
wizard_design_fontDescription: Select a font from our selection or specify your corporate font.
wizard_design_otherGoogleFonts: I'd rather use a different Google Font
wizard_design_customFontPlaceholder: e.g. Helvetica Neue, Arial, Corporate Font Name...
wizard_design_fontPreview: Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Reiciendis minima officia eveniet fugiat ad dicta quia optio quod!
wizard_content_pages_pageNamePlaceholder: e.g. Home, About us, Contact, Services...
wizard_content_pages_pageContentPlacehol: Describe what content should be on this page: Texts, images, functions, etc.
wizard_content_pages_pageCharacteristicP: Which features should be placed on this page? Should content suggestions be developed or should content be used exactly as specified?
wizard_content_formFields_description: Since you have selected a contact form, define the desired fields and their labels here.
wizard_loading_description: Please wait while we process your project.
wizard_modals_error_description: The following errors occurred when submitting your project:
wizard_modals_error_whatHappensDescripti: After closing this dialog, you will be redirected to step 1. Your entries will be retained so that you can fix the problem and try again.
wizard_modals_error_noPreUploaded: No pre-uploaded assets found, uploading now...
wizard_modals_error_customerLinkingFaile: Customer linking failed, but project was created:
wizard_modals_error_waiting: Waiting 3 seconds before publishing to ensure data consistency...
wizard_modals_error_noAssetsPublished: No assets could be published, but project was created and published
wizard_modals_error_networkError: Network error: Connection to server failed
wizard_modals_error_checkConnection: Please check your internet connection and try again.
wizard_modals_thankYou_subtitle: Your project has been submitted successfully
wizard_modals_thankYou_steps_step1: We review your request within 24 hours
wizard_modals_thankYou_steps_step2: You receive a detailed offer by email
wizard_modals_thankYou_steps_step3: We schedule an appointment for a personal conversation
wizard_modals_reset_description: Do you really want to start over? All your previous entries will be lost.
wizard_modals_contact_title: Kontaktiere uns und lass uns loslegen
wizard_modals_contact_description: Wie geht es jetzt weiter? Du kannst uns hier kontaktieren und die weitere Schritte besprechen oder direkte loslegen, wenn bereits alles klar ist und du vollends überzeugt bist. Dazu kannst du hier (---) einen eigenen Account erstellen und dein Projekt im ausführlichen Konfigurator / Wizard erfassen und an uns übermitteln.
wizard_form_targetAudiencePlaceholder: e.g. Small businesses, individuals, B2B customers...
wizard_form_goalsPlaceholder: e.g. Acquire more customers, digitize processes...
wizard_form_inspiration: Are there websites that can serve as inspiration?
wizard_form_customFeaturesPlaceholder: Describe additional special requirements that are not in the list...
wizard_form_placeholders_webApplication: Describe in detail the desired functions and features of your application: What main functions should it have? How should users interact with it? What data will be processed? Are there special requirements for performance or security?
wizard_form_placeholders_freestyle: Describe your individual project in detail: What problem should be solved? What specific requirements do you have? Which systems should be integrated? Which functions are particularly important?
wizard_form_placeholders_default: Describe your project in detail: What is the goal? What problems should it solve? Which target group are you addressing? Do you already have concrete ideas about design or functions?
wizard_navigation_register: Register to use the extended configurator
